PartyConsent.name: PartyConsent
PartyConsent.description: Represents consent preferences for an individual.

Action.description: The action that the Individual is consenting to.

CaptureContactPointType.description: Required. Indicates how you captured consent.

CaptureDate.description: Required. Date when consent was captured.

CaptureSource.description: Required. Indicates how you captured consent. For example, a website or online form.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Name of the party consent record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the account owner associated with this customer.

PartyId.description: Required. Represents the record based on the Individual object you want to associate consent with.

PrivacyConsentStatus.description: Required. Identifies whether the individual associated with this record agrees to this form of contact.
